site.title: Persia Travel Money
site.description: Persia Travel Money card provides a smart card and a secure and convenient payment solution to tourists traveling to Iran to experience Iran like locals do.

order.title: Easy to order
order.text: Persia Travel Money allows you to register your card online before starting your trip, so whenever you land you have access to your money.

load.title: Easy to load
load.text: You can transfer money from any bank account to Persia Travel Money card and it will be ready to spend in Iranian currency.

use.title: Easy to use
use.text: It is easy to manage your money using Persia Travel Money benefiting from its 24/7 services while you are enjoying your journey.

why.title: Why Persia Travel Money
why.text: Iran has always been one of the top destinations for tourists from all around the world who aim to visit historical, cultural and religious sites. In order to provide special payment facilities to the tourists who are willing to travel to Iran, we have established a new generation of card and payment solution. We offer and implement a national tourism payment solution to provide facilities and comfort to the international tourists while on a journey in Iran.

obtain.title: Obtain Persia Travel Money
texts: Every tourist can apply for Persia Travel Money card before starting the journey or during the trip in Iran. The card will be delivered to the tourist in the location of their choice either at the airport or other arriving borders. Whenever you have access to your Persia Travel Money card you can use it in Iranian bank and payment networks.

You can charge your Persia Travel Money card via our website and it will be ready to be spent in Iranian currency. Besides if you carry cash you can change it in selected bank branches and charge your Persia Travel Money. The bank exchange the foreign currency cash to the Iranian Rial and settles the amount in a Persia Travel Money card which is reliable and easy to used for daily transactions and everyday purchases. At the end of the journey, you can withdraw your money from the issued card in the airport or ask our customer service team to transfer and exchange it to desired currency.

about.title: About Us
about.text: Persia Travel Money was established with collaboration of Tosan co. and Iranian banknetworks. Our mission is to provide better facilities and equipment for travelers who want to explore the beauty of Iran. We are presenting a card that helps tourists to transfer their money, in a safe, secure and convenient way while visiting Iran to save money and time. Persia Travel Money helps you to experience Iran like a local and with this card you have access to the large network of shops and merchants in Iran.

returnAndRefund.text: Persia Travel Money card is active in any ATM & POS terminal in Iran and you can directly access to your money. In any situation which you don’t access to Iranian ATM or POS terminal, you can just simply contact our customer care team on +60 3-2093 2721 (9AM – 6 PM) or email us at info@persiatravelmoney.com for any assistance.

faq.text2: If you didn't find the answer in the FAQs, please feel free to drop an email to our helpful customer service team. We'll get back to you as quickly as possible.

questionsAnswers.question: What is the Persia Travel Money?
questionsAnswers.answer: Persia Travel Money card gives you access to the large network of shops and merchants in Iran. By using Persia Travel Money card you can purchase anything in Iran in Iranian Currency, you can also withdraw cash from ATM. Online shopping is another option for our customers; you can use your card to buy souvenirs or anything you need during your stay. By using Persia Travel Money card you don't have to carry cash around or worry about currency exchange while you're out sightseeing.

questionsAnswers.question: How much does Persia Travel Money card cost?
questionsAnswers.answer: It's only 44 MYR per card and there is no other extra or hidden costs while you got your card.

questionsAnswers.question: What are the main benefits of the Persia Travel Money?
Where can I use my Persia Travel Money card?
questionsAnswers.answer: Shopping centers, Tourist Attractions, Restaurants, Hotels, Museums, Entertainment Centers, Parks, Online Shopping and anyplace you need money.

questionsAnswers.question: Is there any benefit in applying for Persia Travel Money now?
questionsAnswers.answer: If you apply the Persia Travel Money online and through this site then you get the option to have access to your card as soon as you arrive in Iran. Then you can start using your Persia Travel Money from the first moment of your journey.

questionsAnswers.question: How can I order the Persia Travel Money?
questionsAnswers.answer: Apply for Persia Travel Money card in the dedicated portal at www.Persiatravelmoney.com. The bank deliberates the application and after confirmation, the card will be delivered to the tourist in the location of their choice either at the airport or other arriving borders.

questionsAnswers.question: How do I activate my Persia Travel Money card?
questionsAnswers.answer: The process to activate your card is easy. You can follow the instructions on the letter attached to your card.

questionsAnswers.question: How can I load my Persia Travel Money card?
questionsAnswers.answer: You can charge your Persia Travel Money card via our website and it will be ready to be spent in Iranian currency. Besides if you carry cash you can change it in selected bank branches and charge your Persia Travel Money.

questionsAnswers.question: Can I apply for Persia Travel Money card when I am in Iran?
questionsAnswers.answer: Yes. You can apply for Persia Travel Money card before starting the journey or during the trip in Iran.

questionsAnswers.question: I lost my persia travel money card, what should I do now?
questionsAnswers.answer: You have to contact to one of our agents to 'Hot' your card and request for another card which issue at the moment with the same amount of money you charged before.
